revtext: I don’t usually write reviews but this one is especially for Ayesha who does the magic all the time when ever you need her. I’ve been in regular touch with her for the past three years for anything related to my topper. She is always ready to make me comfortable in whatever way I ask. This is quite a sensitive issue for me but yet she handles my emotions with lots of love and care! I blindly trust Ayesha for anything related to my topper. She makes your uncomfortable journey very comfortable and confident ❤️
